00039 #define ML_TLM2_REGISTER_TARGET(module_i,tran_t,sckt,buswidth) \
00040   ml_tlm2_register_target <tran_t, buswidth> \
00041     (module_i, (module_i).sckt, #sckt, this->name());
00042 
00043 #define ML_TLM2_REGISTER_TARGET_WITH_PROTOCOL(module_i,tran_t,sckt,buswidth,protocol_types) \

00045     (module_i, (module_i).sckt, #sckt, this->name())

00059 //             THE COMMUNICATION MACROS                  //
00061 
00062 #define ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN(T) \
00063 static gp_mm<T>* global_##T##_mm = gp_mm<T>::get();     \
00064 class ml_tlm2_##T##_companion: public ml_tlm2_gp_companion { \
00065 public: \
00066   ml_tlm2_##T##_companion():ml_tlm2_gp_companion(#T) { } \
00067   ~ml_tlm2_##T##_companion() {} \
00068   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { \
00069     return global_##T##_mm->allocate(); \
00070   } \
00071   virtual void uvm_ml_automation(uvm_ml_packer * p, void * actual_arg, void* other_arg, ml_tlm2_oper op) { \
00072     T * actual UNUSED = (T*) actual_arg; \
00073     T * other UNUSED = (T*) other_arg;
00074 
00075 #define ML_TLM2_GP_END(T) \
00076   } \
00077 }; \
00078 static bool ml_tlm2_##T##_dummy UNUSED = uvm_ml_class_company::register_class_companion(typeid(T), new ml_tlm2_##T##_companion());
00079 
00080 #define ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN(T) \
00081 class ml_tlm2_##T##_companion: public ml_tlm2_ext_companion { \
00082 public: \
00083   ml_tlm2_##T##_companion():ml_tlm2_ext_companion(#T) { } \
00084   ~ml_tlm2_##T##_companion() {} \
00085   virtual void * create_class(const std::string& name = "") { \
00086     return new T; \
00087   } \
00088   unsigned int get_ext_id(tlm_extension_base * ext) { \
00089     T * act = dynamic_cast<T *>(ext); \
00090     return act->ID; \
00091   } \
00092   virtual tlm_extension_base * get_other_ext(tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) {  \
00093     T * other_ext = NULL; \
00094     tlm_gp->get_extension(other_ext); \
00095     return other_ext; \
00096   } \
00097   virtual void uvm_ml_automation(uvm_ml_packer * p, void * actual_arg, void* other_arg, ml_tlm2_oper op) { \
00098     T * actual = (T*) actual_arg;      \
00099     T * other = (T*) other_arg;
00100 
00101 #define ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_END(T)   \
00102   } \
00103 }; \
00104 static bool ml_tlm2_##T##_dummy UNUSED = uvm_ml_class_company::register_class_companion(typeid(T), new ml_tlm2_##T##_companion());
00105 
00106 // Macro ML_TLM2_FIELD defines a fragment of ml_tlm2_automation for the 
00107 // specific field
00108 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD(f) \
00109   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) \
00110     (*p) << actual->f;              \
00111   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) \
00112     (*p) >> actual->f; \
00113   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) \
00114     actual->f = other->f;
00115     
00116 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_DELETABLE(f) \
00117   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) \
00118     (*p) << actual->f;              \
00119   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) \
00120     (*p) >> actual->f;              \
00121   else if (op == ML_TLM2_DELETE_OP) { \
00122     if (actual->f) {                            \
00123       delete actual->f; \
00124       actual->f = NULL; \
00125     } \
00126   } else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) {      \
00127     actual->f->copy(other->f);                  \
00128   }
00129 
00130 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ENUM(T,f)       \
00131   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP)          \
00132     (*p) << (int) actual->f;        \
00133   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00134     int tmp;                          \
00135     (*p) >> tmp;                      \
00136     actual->f = (T)tmp;             \
00137   }                                   \
00138   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) \
00139     actual->f = other->f;
00140 
00141 #define ML_TLM2_LOCAL(f) actual->f
00142 
00143 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ARRAY(T,f,n) \
00144   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) {     \
00145     (*p) << n;                     \
00146     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00147       (*p) << actual->f[j];        \
00148   } \
00149   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00150     T tmp;                            \
00151     int sz;                           \
00152     (*p) >> sz;                       \
00153     if (sz)                           \
00154       actual->f = new T[sz];          \
00155     for (int j = 0; j < sz; j++) {    \
00156       (*p) >> tmp;                    \
00157        actual->f[j] = tmp;            \
00158     }                                 \
00159   }                                   \
00160   else if (op == ML_TLM2_DELETE_OP) { \
00161     if (n && (actual->f != NULL)) {   \
00162        delete [] actual->f;           \
00163        actual->f = NULL;              \
00164     }                                 \
00165   }                                   \
00166   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) { \
00167     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00168       actual->f[j] = other->f[j];  \
00169   } 
00170 
00171 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ARRAY_ENUM(T,f,n) \
00172   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) {     \
00173     (*p) << n;                     \
00174     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00175       (*p) << (int) (actual->f[j]);\
00176   } \
00177   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00178     int tmp;                          \
00179     int sz;                           \
00180     (*p) >> sz;                       \
00181     if (sz)                           \
00182       actual->f = new T[sz];          \
00183     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {     \
00184        (*p) >> tmp;                   \
00185        actual->f[j] = (T) tmp;        \
00186     }                                 \
00187   } \
00188   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) { \
00189     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)    \
00190       actual->f[j] = other->f[j];  \
00191   }  
00192                                  
00193 #define ML_TLM2_FIELD_ACCESSORS(T, getr, setr) \
00194   if (op == ML_TLM2_PACK_OP) \
00195     (*p) << actual->getr(); \
00196   else if (op == ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP) { \
00197     T t; \
00198     (*p) >> t; \
00199     actual->setr(t); \
00200     } \
00201   else if (op == ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP) \
00202     actual->setr(other->getr());
00203 
00204 ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN(tlm_generic_payload) \
00205 ML_TLM2_GP_END(tlm_generic_payload)
00206 
00207 #endif
